name: vue-frappe-formbuilder-health
description: Vue Form Builder PRO MAX built from top of Vue. Super dynamic and flexible including Drag and Drop feature.

scripts.serve: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && cross-env NODE_ENV=development vue-cli-service serve --port 9999
scripts.build-lib: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && cross-env NODE_ENV=production vue-cli-service build --target lib --name v-form-builder ./src/index.js --skip-plugins @vue/cli-plugin-eslint
scripts.build-lib-x: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && cross-env NODE_ENV=production vue-cli-service build --target lib --name v-form-builder ./src/index.js --skip-plugins @vue/cli-plugin-eslint && cp ./dist/v-form-builder.umd.min.js   ./../../apps/frontend/frontend/public/js/forms/lib/fb.bundle.js

keywords: vue form builder with drag drop
